name: SPACE EXTERMINATOR 9,000!
description:
The Whole game is now available! Note: I have fixed a few bugs, and made some changes within the past hour on the full version. Thanks for viewing, and please follow us on twitter @Scian_Games !

Welcome to space, recruit! Your first mission is to go and defeat the evil Gug Conglomerate! You must battle through three difficult bosses, and many waves of minions to be the victor!

Controls:

The controls for this game are W, A, S, and D for movement. Press space to fire!

Enemies:

Sweepers: These jerks will try to smash into your ship to kill ya!

Gugs: These are the guys who started the whole empire! There are two variants of these guys. ones with wings, and ones without. The ones with wings are more common, and worth less (not worthless), and the ones without wings are faster, come by only once, and are worth more points.

Blips: When they move in to attack, hide! They'll spawn sweepers, and they can't be killed,

Bosses:

This would spoil the surprise! I can't tell ya. All I'll say is you'll know when you meet one...

DISCLAIMER THIS SOFTWARE WON'T RUN ON WINDOWS 8 OR NEWER!
